name: Don't let them loot you!
description:
Don't let those greedy adventurers loot you. You have to find the way out of the dungeon.

Controls

  • W, A, S, D to move, hold SHIFT to run
  • Pres F to interact with doors

Authors

Game Design:

  • PatoVerde

The entire team has helped to define the initial concept of the game and have come up with wonderful ideas.

Art:

  • Jeffreyrsb (Instagram: @pupilaplay)
  • Eddcreate (Instagram: @draweduardo)
  • David Maya (Instagram: @davidjmaya Twitter: @davidjmaya)
  • Dai

Programming

  • Daniel Luque (GitHub: @LuqueDaniel, Twitter: @LuqueDaniel)
  • Cristian Rosales (GitHub: @Unstoppable7, Twitter: @cristianrch)
  • RicardoRG (GitHub: @Run19, Twitter @Ricardora071)

All Audio
